src/program_0/main.c

00001 /*! \file
00002  *      \brief The first user program - 
00003  *             in a neverending loop, waits for messages from the other 
00004  *             processes and responds to them.
00005  *
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include <scwrapper.h>
00009 
00010 void
00011 main(int argc, char* argv[])
00012 {
00013  long recv_port;
00014  
00015  /* Launch two instances of program_1 */
00016  if (ALL_OK != createprocess(1))
00017  {
00018   prints("process 0: createprocess(1) failed\n");
00019   debugger();
00020  }
00021 
00022  if (ALL_OK != createprocess(1))
00023  {
00024   prints("process 0: Second instance of createprocess(1) failed\n");
00025   debugger();
00026  }
00027 
00028  /* Get the port index for our own port 0 */
00029  recv_port=findport(0,0);
00030  if (recv_port < 0)
00031  {
00032   prints("process 0: findport for process 0 failed\n");
00033   debugger();
00034  }
00035 
00036 
00037  /* Go into an infinite loop, waiting for messages and sending replies. */
00038 
00039  prints("process 0: main loop\n");
00040  while(1)
00041  {
00042   struct message msg;
00043   unsigned long  sender, type;
00044   long send_port;
00045 
00046   if ((ALL_OK != receive(recv_port, &msg, &sender, &type)) ||
00047       (SYSCALL_MSG_SHORT != type))
00048   {
00049    prints("process 0: receive failed\n");
00050    debugger();
00051   }
00052   prints("process 0: received ping\n");
00053 
00054   /* Test message. */
00055   if ((0 != msg.quad_0) ||
00056       (1 != msg.quad_1) ||
00057       (2 != msg.quad_2) ||
00058       (3 != msg.quad_3) ||
00059       (4 != msg.quad_4) ||
00060       (5 != msg.quad_5) ||
00061       (6 != msg.quad_6) ||
00062       (7 != msg.quad_7))
00063   {
00064    prints("process 0: message test failed\n");
00065    debugger();
00066   }
00067 
00068   send_port=findport(0, sender);
00069   if (send_port < 0)
00070   {
00071    prints("process 0: findport for process failed\n");
00072    debugger();
00073   }
00074 
00075 
00076   msg.quad_0=7;
00077   msg.quad_1=6;
00078   msg.quad_2=5;
00079   msg.quad_3=4;
00080   msg.quad_4=3;
00081   msg.quad_5=2;
00082   msg.quad_6=1;
00083   msg.quad_7=0;
00084 
00085   if (ALL_OK != send(send_port, &msg))
00086   {
00087    prints("process 0: send failed\n");
00088    debugger();
00089   }
00090   prints("process 0: sent pong\n");
00091  }
00092 }
